snippet: The huge population shift that transformed California over the last decade has produced an intense struggle over the political riches that the shift has produced: the seven Congressional seats that California has gained at the expense of New York ...
lead_paragraph: The huge population shift that transformed California over the last decade has produced an intense struggle over the political riches that the shift has produced: the seven Congressional seats that California has gained at the expense of New York and other Northeastern states. The release of California census numbers this week has intensified the horse-trading over who will control the redrawing of Congressional district lines in the state, which will send 52 members to the House of Representatives in 1992.

headline.main: CALIFORNIA IS TORN BY POLITICAL WARS OVER 7 NEW SEATS
